group.name: Plugin Commands: Infrared LED
group.description: The Infrared LED plugin contributes several commands to the application framework's CLI. These commands are used for testing low level operation of the LED and sending out IR waveforms as if a button had been pressed or held.

command.description: Toggle IR LED each time BUTTON1 is pressed.
Turn IR LED on and off based on state of BUTTON1.
Output IR waveform as if a button were pressed.

arg.name: index
arg.description: The index of UIRD database to use for the waveform.

command.description: Output IR waveform as if a button were held.

arg.name: index
arg.description: The index of UIRD database to use for the waveform.

command.description: Output IR waveform when BUTTON1 is pressed or held.

arg.name: index
arg.description: The index of UIRD database to use for the waveform.
